item.description:
UPDATE 4: Be great if someone can video record the RP contingent in the parade.

 

UPDATE 3:

We need RP signs, signs, signs for the parade. Bring as many as you can!

 

UPDATE 2:

It is recommended that everyone take the MBTA to the starting location near Broadway station. If you have a lot of signs, banners, etc. (that you can't carry) give me a call. 857 350-0575. Joe

UPDATE:

We raised the parade fee and, with the offer of a blimp, just need the cash to buy the helium. Chip in below.

 

There's a map of the parade route here:

https://www.facebook.com/events/201382803300706/

Invite your friends! Help make the Ron Paul contingent a success!

***************************************************

Late breaking news.....

We ('Ron Paul for President') have been approved to join the official St. Pat's Day parade in South Boston on Sunday, March 18.

Marchers should arrive by 11:30 and the parade steps off at 1:00 PM. This is the second largest St. Pat's parade in the country with tens of thousands of viewers along the route and more on TV.

It is only a week away and so preparations must begin now to join the parade. We need to raise $350 ($150 out of parade fee of $500. is pledged) to participate. You can chip in here: http://bostonronpaulantiwaraerialbanner.chipin.com/ron-paul-contingent-in-bostons-st-patricks-day-parade

If you want to join in, help fund or coordinate give me a call or drop me an email (jureneck@comcast.net). Marching bands welcome!

Joe Ureneck, Boston Ron Paul 2012 Meetup, 857 350-0575
item.name: Ron Paul contingent in Boston's St. Patrick's Day Parade!
